item.title: Beyond Good and Evil
item.description: tags Philosophy keywords Existentialism Motivation for reading He’s the one that paved the way for existentialism, and he’s work is heavily referenced in Camus' work… I have long wanted to read about him. Memo Quote Ch1-3 As little as the act of birth comes into consideration in the whole process and procedure of heredity, just as little is “being-conscious” as opposed to the instinctive in any decisive sense; the greater part of the conscious thinking of a philosopher is secretly influenced by his instincts, and forced into definite channels.
